QuestData.Title: In Search of Inner Calm
QuestData.Description:
I have always had dreams.
Special dreams you could say.
Any place of tranquility or calm can come to me in a dream.
Even those that may have danger nearby, as calm can be found anywhere, if you know how.
Now I dream of your world, your Azeroth.
I cannot travel to your realm. Help me connect to my latest dream through your eyes.
I have dreamed of a high place. A very high place. Do you know it?
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Highmountain in search of calm
